website_summaries.verdict: A tasty treat that cats love. Easy on the digestive system.
pros: This box of 50 3-inch chicken sticks will keep your cat happy for a while
Their soft texture makes them easy to chew
cons: Cats will eagerly eat these sticks whole, so they should be broken into small pieces
Long list of ingredients, including salt and sugar

customer_reviews.title: Om nom nom nom... meep!
customer_reviews.text: The chicken sticks are her favorite! Pokey turned 2 this week and had a blast scarfing these down (alongside her real dinner).
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Aurich

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Quality -Cat Wouldn’t Eat Them
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that my cat didn’t like these -though they’re his favorite treat ! These are wrapped individually and are usually very soft. These were tough, even to my touch, opening them for my little guy. He was happy at the familiar scent, then pulled away. He ate a few when nothing else was around; I had to drive to Walmart and bring home more, which were soft. He gobbled then up. To be fair, the next Walmart batch was inconsistent. I’m spending way too much time and money on the Sheba Tender Sticks -then must throw them out! Won’t order again!
customer_reviews.author: JJB

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the stomach
customer_reviews.text: Royal Canin is expensive so I looked for cat food with pork in it and found these. They help my senior cats maintain their weight and my younger cats love them too. Careful with how much you let them eat! They'd eat a whole box if you let them.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Best Healthy Cat Treat Ever
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about my flavor accept my cat loves these treats. Every evening before bedtime he runs to the pantry and does a dance around the kitchen until I give him his treat. I break it up into pieces. I feel like this is a a very healthy treat...I do have to wash my hands after breaking up the stick because it is so flavorful my hands smell like salmon, tuna or whatever the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Joy A. Mundy

customer_reviews.title: Check your orders
customer_reviews.text: My cat really like these treats. This is my second delivery. Came with monthly subscription. Not sure why but most of the individual packs are open.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: These are like a drug for our cat!
customer_reviews.text: All we have to do is crinkle the package and then open it up and the cat comes running. Ever watch a video where a cat makes noises as it eats, well these make the cat do that, not food, not wet food, just these treats. When he gets outside and we need to lure him back in, out comes one of these bad boys. We keep them in a closed cabinet or he will gorge himself in them, yes we have come home to a pile of empty wrappers before. Give your pussy a delicious treat and get them these!
customer_reviews.author: Hibbing Halloween

customer_reviews.title: My cat thinks these are the greatest invention of the modern world
customer_reviews.text: My cat demands these. Not just a meow here or there, but she actually stands in the kitchen screaming at me if she does not get one after her breakfast. These are by far the greatest thing to come into her life and as her lowly human, I get to provide her with them. This is the easiest way for me to keep my queen happy and chunky. She is a very happy cat because of these.
customer_reviews.author: Mblmrchick

customer_reviews.title: My most favorite treat, paws down!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite treat, ever! I love it so much, I taught myself how to open the cupboard where Daddy stored these treats. AND THEN I taught myself how to open the individual packages. You can imagine how happy my hoomins were when they woke up in the morning and saw I had chewed my way through no less than twenty treats! For some reason Daddy keeps them in a container with a lid I can't open so now only get to eat one treat a day.
customer_reviews.author: Raine Daisy

customer_reviews.title: This product is not what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: My kittens used to love Sheba sticks, it was their favorite treat, but these sticks are NOT the same, my kittens smell it and walked away. I opened another stick next day, same story - no interest at all. Either they changed recipe or something else is wrong. The packaging looks identical, but something is different with the product. And it is not returnable. Update: I complained to manufacture 2 weeks ago, today received from them a tiny coupon $2 worth, to buy only one sheet of those sticks ( there are 5 sticks in one sheet).
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: My cat goes nuts
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these treats. He pretty much goes bananas for it. And everyone I've recommended the treat too has said the same thing for their cats. Its like drugs for them, they get so addicted and excited when they see you pull out that treat
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Molly is hooked on these treats!
customer_reviews.text: My cat Molly loves these treats! She knows where I store them and sits by the cabinet waiting! She wants the whole box. LOL I have to ignore her begging after she has one. If I forget to give her one, she runs back and forth to get my attention. When I get up she meows and runs to the storage cabinet. Makes me laugh. Cats are the best. She has me trained well! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Butler

customer_reviews.title: Two and a half out of three cats approve :)
customer_reviews.text: My one cat loves these (and she's really not tempted by much but these def tempt her). The stray cat that I regularly feed loves these. My senior cat thinks they're ok...he'll have a few bites but not finish the rest. He must like them a little or he wouldn't bother eating them at all. My other cat doesn't mind him leaving half behind :)
customer_reviews.author: R G.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize I would get 10 packs of 5 sticks haha! What a fantastic deal! My kitties were enjoying their first stick so much that they wouldn't leave me alone! Even the dog was able to swindle his way into getting one. They are soft, but also pretty thick, so they are okay for frisky teethers. My little one who has a tough time chewing hard food LOVED being able to gently nibble on this. I'm really happy, my kitties are happy, the dog is happy, overall great product! I don't usually recommend stuff, but I recommend this great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I buy these on nearly a weekly basis for my cats and they're always been great, however this latest order I've had to throw out over half of them. Ive only just received them on Monday, they're dated 3/27/2021 and 1/3 of them are rock hard & about another 1/2 are quite dry and tough that my cats who normally go nuts, refuse to eat them. Once in a while you'll get one of these in a batch, no big deal. But 3/4 of the entire order is pretty upsetting. That's a lot of money wasted and product. So now I'm going to have to order more already. And hope they're up to par this time.
customer_reviews.author: EvilNan

customer_reviews.title: Opened packages
customer_reviews.text: Half of the packaged items where opened - dried out - cat cannot eat, hard as rocks See pic- opened at top
customer_reviews.author: 12julie87

customer_reviews.title: The product is OK, but I won't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: First, I have to say the product is very affordable. For the same amount of money, you get way more portions of treats than other products. But I was a little surprised that the sticks are so soft. I was hoping to buy these sticks for my cats to chew for a while. That's probably my delusion. My biggest issue with it was out of this pack of 50 there were at least three sticks smelled funny. When it comes to food, safety is my biggest concern.
customer_reviews.author: Boyang Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Cats love these
customer_reviews.text: Both of my cats love these sticks! I usually break them up into little pieces before I give them to the cats.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Ebert

customer_reviews.title: My cat luvs it
customer_reviews.text: The subject pretty much covers it. She will stand on her back legs when she sees me pull out the package to tear one off to open for her. Only trouble I've ever had with it at all was sometimes tearing off 1 of the single stick packs from the overall packing it'll tear sideways into another stick's packing instead of following the perforating. So just gotta be a little careful there.
customer_reviews.author: Horror Fan

customer_reviews.title: Makes 3 Cats Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these treats as a replacement for a discontinued Friskies item that was a favorite. I ordered both the Tuna and Chicken flavors hoping they would be acceptable to my picky cats. The 50 sticks are individually wrapped, have a mild smell and a firm but not hard consistency. They are kinda small, maybe 4" long, making them a little pricey but they were a hit!
customer_reviews.author: fuzzymitton

customer_reviews.title: Not a favorite
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult for me to evaluate the flavor of these because I did not actually eat any. But, my cat did not either so I assume they were not very good. Otherwise a good value.
customer_reviews.author: TimFromWimberley

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Go Crazy for These
customer_reviews.text: These are great treats and my two cats love them. I usually break one or two sticks into pieces and use them to train my cats. Basic ‘come here,’ ‘get up’ and ‘get down’ (off counter) so far. Other times I use them as a good night treat. Huey takes the whole treat, walks a few feet away, and devours it. Louie eats way slower and has a hard time breaking food into pieces so I break it up for him. (That way Louie eats the whole treat before his brother Huey has time to finish his and sneak back over to steal Louie’s.)
customer_reviews.author: Lizard

customer_reviews.title: Cats like them, wasteful packaging
customer_reviews.text: I find the single packaging wasteful, and if you are not careful when tearing each package off it will tear into the stick next to the one you want. They stink. But my two kitties love them. My adult cat will meow and lead me to the place we store them and as soon as I start opening the Kitten will appear waiting for the treat. I don’t give a whole stick to the kitties I break them into pieces and they share the bits.
customer_reviews.author: Adk79

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Neko and I have a tradition, and she knows what time it is: 7PM, she gets a meat stick. Judging from how she inhales it if I let her, the flavor must be great. Nice and soft for an aging beauty, too. I like getting the whole box, because it saves money and I don't run out as fast. Nobody wants a disappointed cat whose guardian ran out of treats.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey C.

customer_reviews.title: Cats are addicted
customer_reviews.text: My cats come running when they hear me open up one of these packages. I pull off little pieces and use them to work on tricks such as "high five", "up", and "sit". I can also hide them around our home and they have a fun little hide-and-seek session. They do dry out if you leave them out the package too long, but the cats don't seem to care.
customer_reviews.author: R. N. Kinnison

customer_reviews.title: Read the ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: My cat enjoyed these for a while until I read the ingredients!!!! All kinds of pork, pork rind, animal plasma....These are not healthy for a cat. Have discontinued use. My cat is older and has recently been showing signs of health issues too. Hope that going back to healthy diet without these will be a good direction.
customer_reviews.author: R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect treat for your cat
customer_reviews.text: I treat my cat everyday in the evening with this stick. She loves it and never miss to remind us to give her the same time everyday. She is very shy and never goes to anybody except when they offer this stick to her. I give her chicken and tuna flavored stick on alternate days. She enjoys it a lot. Try it with your cat and you will see it too.
customer_reviews.author: Parashuram M

customer_reviews.title: my 2 boys hate these treats, let's see if homeless cats will eat this ?
customer_reviews.text: my 2 felines didn't eat this at all , I wasted around 6 treats and convinced them and they just walked away .. I guess il be giving this to homeless cats , and if they dont eat it ... this company send me some trash
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cat normally luvs this particular treat, but not this box!
customer_reviews.text: I assume that something bad happened during the production of this box of treats because my cat begs for them normally! However, she will not touch any of this particular box. Takes one smell and walks away.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Schall

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Go Nuts Over These
customer_reviews.text: These treats seem a little high in price. But whenever I find them, I but them, all my cats go crazy over them. You know you buy some treats and the cats are like ok, it's something different, so we'll eat it. I don't have that problem here, as soon as they hear the package, I can't get it opened fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lavender Lady

customer_reviews.title: Treats for picky cats
customer_reviews.text: My cat Elmer has turned up his nose at all kinds of treats except these. They're a bit more expensive so he gets them and my other cat Waffles gets a different kind.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma B.

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my brat cat
customer_reviews.text: She loves them!!! So much so that she knows where I store them and broke into the cabinet and tore up the box trying to get to them. She wasn't able to get into the package, though. I think it's because they have plastic in the wrapping, and thank goodness for that. But she chewed up quite a few of them. They are now in a plastic container with a screw on lid. If she grows an opposable thumb, I'll start worrying.
customer_reviews.author: SnafoooTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves 'em but...
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves these treats! But unfortunately they make him poop alot more AND it stinks to high heavens, it literally looked like a human took a sh!t in his litter box. So once I stopped giving them to him he's been using the litter normal and well it still smells but normal not like he had something rotting inside. But of course every cat is different so it doesn't mean this happens to all cats, if you're thinking of trying go ahead because they love 'em fore sure just have in mind to look out for changes.
customer_reviews.author: gloryssa

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty picky cat, but who doesn't as most cats can be somewhat finicky! This is one of her favorite snacks. I give her one every morning after breakfast. I guess they taste good because she never turns one down! I was buying them at the store but I found that I get a better value buying a bigger box on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann

customer_reviews.title: My cat is "meh" about these. They HAVE to be broken up.
customer_reviews.text: Dont think for a second that if you give your cat a full stick that they will chew it piece by piece. No. They will swallow it whole and barf it back up. But even if they are broken just slightly too big they arent apparently tasty enough for my cat to hassle with a bigger bite.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Cats aren't interested
customer_reviews.text: My kitty liked the very first one I gave her but has not wanted any more of them since and I bought a whole box. ugh.
customer_reviews.author: The Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great treats but too pricy.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these treats. That being said until she gets a job to pay for them we'll need to pass. Becareful of pack size, make sure you receive the number that's stated. I ended up receiving 5 for around 16.00. It stated 50 and now it's 10. Not a fan of inconsistency.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Hard Treat
customer_reviews.text: 5 of the packages were not sealed on the bottom of the packages. Way worse than my 1st box. Replace one more time, but please open the box first to make sure none of them are opened and ruined.
customer_reviews.author: JBlue19

customer_reviews.title: Cats don’t like it. 4paws down
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t taste it so I don’t know if it’s good. My kids aren’t really interested in it. For 50 it was a bit pricy . It smells like the real thing. When broken in bite size pieces the kids can manage them, but they aren’t really into them. I don’t see any filler so in that they are good value. Wish there was a “trial” size like 5 sticks. I won’t be ordering it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine T.

customer_reviews.title: Gordon Ramsay of cat treats
customer_reviews.text: The moment I cracked the seal on the package, my two cats stopped plotting against me. They both ate a treat and started a blog site to discuss the subtle notes of chicken and salmon. One critique the black one gave me was to add a bit of coriander, mint, and maybe a touch of tuna sashimi.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger

customer_reviews.title: My kitties love them
customer_reviews.text: My cats go absolutely NUTS for these treats. They like other kinds, but this is obviously their favorite. I definitely tear it off in smaller pieces where the little notches are because otherwise they will basically inhale the entire stick as fast as you can give it to them.
customer_reviews.author: ThatOneChick

customer_reviews.title: They're her favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is our baby and finding the best for her is important to us, and she loves the chicken ones. Crinkle the package she comes running, but don't have to usually - like clockwork she knows when is treat time, she comes over where I keep them.... and tries to paw them out of the cupboard!! These are definitely a favorite of hers.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Napp

customer_reviews.title: Best quality treats and packaging
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few months ago. The packaging is great and the treats are still fresh. My cat went nuts. Ive purchased other brands, my cat will turn his nose and tail up at other treats. If your feline likes this type of treat, this is our first choice!
customer_reviews.author: M Jamison

customer_reviews.title: If Munch likes them, they must be good.
customer_reviews.text: Our fussy 9 month old, teenage kitten actually likes these! I bought them thinking he could at least play with them if he didn't eat them right away (unless he's sleeping, he's either playing or into mischief). But, he gobbles them right up without so much as a swat!
customer_reviews.author: krenTop Contributor: Aquascaping

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves them.
customer_reviews.text: They are chewy which makes my cat eat them more slowly so he doesn’t inhale them and throw up. He likes them so much he’s learned the word “treats” and I have to spell the word...otherwise he screams for them if he hears the word...LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Try a few first to see if your cat likes them.
customer_reviews.text: Depends on the cat, one absolutely loves them and plays with them like it were a mouse, then devours them. She comes running as soon as she hears the crackling of the foil. The other cat wants nothing to do with them. But of course we are talking about cats...
customer_reviews.author: Carol Grant

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes them but pricy and small
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these treats before elsewhere and I was shocked these were so small. My cat loves them but he's use to the big sticks and it takes 2-3 to make up the difference. A little pricy when I can get the same amount of the big sticks cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: B J

customer_reviews.title: Two out of two housecats love them!
customer_reviews.text: As the Friskies Pull N Play string treats have been discontinued (Who knew that those 'trained cats to eat string' ? Stupid cats...) These are a suitable replacement treat that our two cats thoroughly enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Cat LOVES theses
customer_reviews.text: According to our cat, she loves theses. She knows the package. She was raised from a tiny kitten with a 100lbs dog. She acts a little like a dog. She goes ape when she see the package. This is the only treat she acts this way.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Wortman

customer_reviews.title: Cats Favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my cats Favorite treat!! Loves so much and always begs for more! So happy I could get so many at once for not to much!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna M.

customer_reviews.title: Cat's favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had these and I tried them for my cat. She absolutely loves them and will come if I say "Want a treat" it's like she knows and she is ready for these nummy treats. Sticks break apart very easy and stay fresh a long time
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: My cat can't get enough
customer_reviews.text: My cat Rufus lives his meat sticks. The highlight of his day is his nightly meat stick.
customer_reviews.author: Gaius Baltar

customer_reviews.title: Pure heaven to two of my cats!
customer_reviews.text: I have to view these through my cats' eyes and reaction because I do not eat them. We have three cats and two of them LOVE these and actually sit next to the drawer they are stored in to tell me they want more!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hughes

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves them
customer_reviews.text: He cannot get enough of them. He's such a stubborn cat unless he thinks he is about to get rewarded for actually doing nothing. I've never seen fat boy run as fast as he does when he's chasing down one of these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Goes Crazy
customer_reviews.text: My cat is very finicky. There are only certain flavors & brands she'll even consider. She grabs these "Sheba meaty sticks" right out of my hand. I had to buy a case of them. Highly recommend to all cat lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Baby

customer_reviews.title: Kitty love
customer_reviews.text: My cat really likes these. I like being able to break off a few pieces at at time and leave the rest in the sleeve for later. My cat has never gotten tired of these like he has with other treats. FYI-they do contain sugar. I wish they didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckIndy

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love!!
customer_reviews.text: my cat is OBSESSED with these treats. I've been giving them to her since she was a kitten and she can't get enough. She plays with it and bats it around for a while before she eats it so it works out because yes she is eating a treat, but she gets excersize with it!
customer_reviews.author: pogo9090

customer_reviews.title: My cat's favorite bedtime snack
customer_reviews.text: Soft chew breakable segments or hold it and let them bite off portions. My cat's favorite bedtime snack won't settle down till he gets one. A subscription item for me if I want sleep at night!!
customer_reviews.author: jvw

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I give my cat one of these every night at bed time. She runs up the stairs and hops on the bed and sits and waits for me to get all settled in and then will not leave me alone until I give her one. It's gone in seconds!!!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Yes and no
customer_reviews.text: My one cat did not like these at all. He would not even look at them. My other cat liked them alright. Just not my cats sorta thing. They package they so amazing. You can feel how fresh they are.
customer_reviews.author: Thowra

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey but my cats adore them
customer_reviews.text: My cats are absolutely obsessed with these. They grab 'em and growl! I wish they were more cost effective and available at my local grocery store. I will continue buying them because my rescues love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: MissSillyGoose

customer_reviews.title: Kitties ❤️ the Salmon.
customer_reviews.text: 5 🐾🐾🐾🐾🐾! Both cats love the Sheba treats. Who am I to argue with their taste buds? Do not give treats often, but since their 8th birthday is coming up, splurged on the twin gals! 🐯 🐯
customer_reviews.author: The Princess and the Pea

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these but they are a bit expensive, so I won't be purchasing again. But it was fun to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love these sticks. They have never been so excited and vocal until I bring out these treat sticks. I break them into 4 pieces before I give to them. They wolf them down.
customer_reviews.author: Sailorchick

customer_reviews.title: Cats go crazy for these sticks
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats, and they love these meat sticks. Probably their favorite treat. As soon as they hear me tear the package open they come running. My older cat who is 7 I can give him the whole stick and he'll chew it up, my other cat who is 5 needs me to break it up into smaller pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Coluccio

customer_reviews.title: Lulu loves them
customer_reviews.text: My wife has greeted our Maine Coon Lulu for several years each morning with a "sausage." It's a daily ritual which we all enjoy. Her name (the cat) is Lulu, and she endorses these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Arny and Grace

customer_reviews.title: Mine were stale...
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these! Heads up, about half of them were stale (hard as rock) when opened. Not sure why- never had an issue buying in store, but took a risk to buy online.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cats won't eat them.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these chicken sticks, but none of my 4 cats will eat them. Tried them whole and broken into pieces, but no go. Unfortunately I ordered the large package, so hoping the shelter cats appreciate them.
customer_reviews.author: essel

customer_reviews.title: Cats love these
customer_reviews.text: All three of our cats love these but you have to tear it into pieces for them (although one will sometimes eat it whole), and at least one of these guys is a picky eater
customer_reviews.author: Mark Or Valerie Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: MY CATS FREAK!
customer_reviews.text: My cats FREAK OUT over these meat sticks. I’ve never seen them like any dry dewars this much, it’s usually only the wet treats with fish, tuna or chicken. These are a HIT!
customer_reviews.author: Scars

customer_reviews.title: Great price for amount received
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loves these and they are hard to find in stock at the store on a regular basis. My only complaint is if you only have 1 pet they don’t stay fresh long enough.
customer_reviews.author: knightreigner

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Can't recall what the ingredients are, but I was not altogether happy with the non-meat items. My cat eventually got around to eating them, but they took some getting used to for him.
customer_reviews.author: Photon

customer_reviews.title: They’ll eat it, but only cause they’re fat
customer_reviews.text: My cats aren’t usually picky eaters, but this is one treat they reluctantly will eat. Wish they liked it better since it’s an easy snack to give them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cats favorites
customer_reviews.text: I have four cats and foster kittens, these are the favorite of the house. My kitties are picky and spoiled rotten but still go crazy for these.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna!!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent treats but hard to open
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the Salmon (I haven’t tried it, lol) but the individual packages are next to impossible to open without scissors, a knife, or very sharp teeth.
customer_reviews.author: L. Burr

customer_reviews.title: Our 4 cats love these treats. They must have good flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love these and get one every night. They must taste good or they would not like them so much. Try them on your cats, I bet they love them too.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE FLEMING

customer_reviews.title: Cat Treat Gourmet
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these "meat sticks" and will pull it out of the wrapper as I am trying to open it. If a cat even hears the ripping of the treat package he/she comes running.
customer_reviews.author: Lythria

customer_reviews.title: ... is addicted to these - not sure if that's good or bad
customer_reviews.text: My cat is addicted to these - not sure if that's good or bad, but she is a good well behaved cat & has never destroyed anything in the house as far as scratching, so I will continue to reward her with these treats.
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY A TREAT SHE'LL EAT
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I finally found a cat treat that my Coco loves, she so picky but these were the one treat I've found she loves so I'm glad I purchased a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Daisey

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these! It's really cute watching her get so excited while she watches me open the package. As soon as the treat is showing, she jumps up and grabs it! To me that's the only sign of approval I need to tell me it tastes yummy and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: LChristine

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit with the little ones!
customer_reviews.text: My cats won’t eat any other treats. All I have to do is pick them up and they come running. Please make the 50 count boxes available again... PLEASE!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M Miller

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is weird in that she doesn't usually want treats, but she loves these to the point that she yells at me for one!
customer_reviews.author: Caitastrophe

customer_reviews.title: Best treat ever
customer_reviews.text: My car loves these. It is her favorite treat. I was devastated when Giant Food discontinued it. Amazon to the rescue! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Louise M. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Cats favorite.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves them. I wish you could them in a contain not individually wrapped, bit of a waste that they are all wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: D Brixey

customer_reviews.title: Addicting treats
customer_reviews.text: Cat is hooked on these treats. Even the strays love them They growl and run and hide when they eat these. Not everyone sells them so i order them. They love all flavors
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ann Russo

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treats!
customer_reviews.text: Tasty treats but very fattening. If you give an indoor cat 1 treat a day for 6 months, expect a weight gain of 1lb (my cat)!
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: My cats love them
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 very finicky cats and these are the only treats my cat will eat. they let me know when they want their treats that’s how well they like them.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Nash

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Cat is picky so I stick to what I tested to be good instead of trying something new. My cat is happy with it till now.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: My Cat is Crazy about This
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you, my cat is CRAZY about these treats. He knows the sound of them when I just start opening it. The only thing is just make sure you do not give him large bites as he might choke. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrei AG

customer_reviews.title: Cats love these
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these. She consumes them do fast there is no chance to take a picture. They're soft, not chewy.
customer_reviews.author: BetsyB

customer_reviews.title: Your cat will be so happy
customer_reviews.text: Just listen to sound my cat makes while he is eating it you will know he is so happy!😻 Thank you amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Hosein H.

customer_reviews.title: Pork included
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something without pork, not what I wanted. My cat doesn't have pork included in its diet.
customer_reviews.author: Legendary

customer_reviews.title: kitty  loves to chase these
customer_reviews.text: love these sticks.. break them off and toss and kitties race to get them.. Wish they still had the Whitefish flavor.. seems to be discontinued ?? was a kitty favorite
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. I have to break them up a little bit for my older cat because they seem chewy, but my cats go crazy for them
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Our kitties’ favorites 😊
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love these but the packaging is annoying and they’re a little costly but as long as our cats love them I will buy them.
customer_reviews.author: mawemom

customer_reviews.title: I only received one pack
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pack of 50 treats and only received one pack! I have ordered these before and they came in a nice box. What happened?? My cats are extremely upset! :(
customer_reviews.author: Christina Poston

customer_reviews.title: Great taste but too little
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting snack but their quantity is TOO little for the price. there are better alternatives out there for sure.
customer_reviews.author: KZ1221

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely the best buy. My cats go crazy over these treats which have become our nighttime routine special treat before bed. They absolutely love them and I love the price I can get them for.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Kitty favourite
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love these things. They are a special occasion treat, but now the cats think everything is a special occasion.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My three cats are not untested , I thought they would be because they go after dog chews. But they came quickly and are as promised
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer stack

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: As others stated, my cats love them. Bags are hard to open. Very costly, but OK if my cats approve.
customer_reviews.author: SchwartzKat

product_meta.title: Sheba Meaty Tender Sticks Cat Treats, Pack of 50
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:ChickenAdult cats love the taste of real meat just as much as their canine counterparts. That's why there's SHEBA Meaty Tender Sticks Cat Treats With Chicken. Made with real chicken and no filler ingredients, SHEBA Meaty Tender Sticks Treats for Cats offer a soft and savory snacking experience that your feline companion will adore. SHEBA Cat Treats are the ultimate, once-daily treat made with mouthwatering ingredients that cats truly crave.
feature_bullets: Contains fifty (50) 0.14-oz. SHEBA Meaty Tender Sticks With Chicken Cat Treat
SHEBA Meaty Tender Sticks Treats for Cats are made with real meat for a taste adult cats love
These irresistible cat snacks are made with no corn, wheat, soy and no artificial flavors.Calorie content: 3309 kcal ME/kg, 13 kcal ME/stick
Each SHEBA Meaty Tender Sticks Cat Treat is individually packaged for maximum freshness
Feed your feline friend one SHEBA Meaty Tender Sticks Cat Treat per day
